reviews.review: The game is very fun I just wish the game wasn't so survivor sided the killers have a really hard time killing every survivor most matches you only end up killing 1-2 of the survivors every match you play.

Ormai sono passati 6 anni dall'uscita di Dead by Daylight, ma nonostante ciò vale ancora molto, ricco di eventi e novità costanti nel tempo. Il game a molti può sembra ripetitivo poichè e questo il gioco: spawn, generatori, scappi dal killer ( chiunque esso sia ) e dopo aver salvato i compagni dal gancio o averli curati e aprire la porta alla fine dei 5 gen, sempre se il killer non abbia "noed" ( per chi ci gioca sa che m...a e quel perk ) ma tralasciando questi dettagli, il gioco ha una rigiocabilità straordinaria , sopratutto se giocato insieme a dei compagni . La grafica e quella che è, anche se a volte presenza delle piccole imperfezioni, bug c'è ne sono diversi ma non fastidiosi . 

Pro:
- vasta scelta di personaggi tra killer e sopravvissuti;
- perk originali e facilmente creare delle build adatte al game ( per favore mettete "tempo prezioso" )
- mappe strutturate a doc e pensate per ogni tipo di game;
- ultimo pro, adoro la chicca di pinhead con la voce originale di Doug Bradley , 1000 IQ hai ai creatori.

Contro 
- bug davvero fastidioso che nonostante gli anni persiste , i killer avvolte sembra che non ti colpiscano ma gli da la hit lo stesso ;
- i compagni che ti vengono a liberare dal gancio senza " tempo prezioso " dovrebbero essere bannati a vita dal game .

Pareri finali: 
Dead by Daylight va giocato assolutamente , almeno una volta per provare questa esperienza di gioco, e se giocato in compagnia non smetterai mai di giocarci, posso assicurarlo !! 

VOTO: 7/8

It's funny how survivors and killers complain about the game being one-sided towards one side. It is clear that the game is one-sided towards survivors, which is why Killer mains are quitting the game. As a survivor you can expect long waiting times, because there's just not enough Killers anymore. The matchmaking after six years is still a hot mess, so as a beginner you could end up playing against someone way above your skill level. Balancing menas for the devs to look at the top1% of killers and if they get more than 2 kills on average they either nerf the killers or buff the survivors.They literally say that in interviews unironically, because they think thats balancing the game, even though as stated before the matchmaking is a hot mess, and the top1% of killers won't often go against a lobby full of top1% survivors. The endgame collapse was supposed to keep the survivors from holding the game hostage, but since it only triggers once an exit game is open, it just gives the Survivors the chance to 99% both gates and heal up before they rescue someone on the hook. And you can't counter that as a killer, because if you open a gate to put time pressure on the survivors you only leave the hooked survivor unprotected and create an escape route. low rank killers get literally bullied if they are matched with better survivors and if you ignore the survivors selfmade rules they will insult you. if you still want to play the game as killer, throw the survivor's rulebook out of the window. Or simply don't buy this hot mess of a game
Arkadaş ile daha iyi oluyor ama tek başınızada sarıyor

This game is extremely unbalanced. The Devs only care about killers and have been nerfing survivors for the past year and buffing killer at the same time. If you are a killer main that complains about survivors being better than you, you are honest to God bad at the game. The amount of times I have been camped to death and tunneled is countless. Yet killer is probs the easiest role to play. I have countless memories of toxic killers with my friends, which is why we are equally toxic in the survivor community.
The Devs are a whole different story. I 100% believe that the DBD Devs are one of the top 10 worst Dev teams in the history of gaming. It is abundantly clear that all the Dev have no friends and therefore main killers. Then proceed to suck at their own game and try and buff the killers they enjoy playing. Stop dick riding all these killer mains and get some friends to play survivor with and you will see how mind numbingly stupid and blind you all are. The audacity you all have to consider yourselves "qualified" for your position is absolutely baffling.
The constant struggle of playing with randoms is tiring. The "skill based matchmaking" is, at best, trash. Simple as that. I have dealt with too many incompetent teammates when running duos and trios.
Lastly, Behaviour Interactive team are a bunch of money loving scammer. Over the years players have been waiting for cross progression. There is no reason for this game to not have cross progression. Cross progression is a basic need in todays age. I don't want to hear any excuses about platforms needing to confirm whether they will allow it or any B.S. like that. That is the most sorry excuse I have heard from the team. I can name plenty of games that have access to cross progression. I refuse to switch a platform and spend money on things I have elsewhere just because your lazy team wants money the easy way.
I have never had this much frustration with a game and its Dev team in all my years of gaming. If you want to play this game go right ahead, but don't expect to get much out of it. I truly hate DBD and its Dev team with a passion and it's a damn shame to see ,what once was a great game, go to complete waste.

This game makes me severely unhappy and depressed.

Would recommend an hour or two on a daily basis to lower your self esteem

Eu começei a jogar DBD a 3 meses. Pensei que seria um jogo fraco, pois é sempre o mesmo objetivo, assassino matar sobrevivente ou sobrevivente fazer gerador e escapar. Mas cada partida é única, ou sofre ou dá muita risada. Mas recomendo se for jogar de sobrevivente jogar com amigos em call. Jogar com random é passar raiva, ou não. Mas bem provável de levar kill. Enfim, eu recomendo o jogo sim, por mais que tunelado seja ou pegar uns killer camper, vale a pena. Dá pra perder um tempo jogando, já tenho 377 horas no jogo e maior parte delas foram bons momentos. Gostei tanto do jogo que busquei platinar ele. Estou com 197/203 conquistas, por mais que a Behaviour adicione mais com as DLCs vai valer a pena continuar jogando. Bora loopar killer galera!

It's a fun game, but just as a warning, the devs clearly do not give 2 shits about the game. The game has a shitty report system and they nerf and change to much stuff. Not to mention, there is zero point in trying to queue with random players cause the game is very difficult with no call outs or team coordination. If you are playing with friends, the game is always fun and a great time. The amount of techniques and strategies in the game are also a nice touch as they allow any user to be creative in the game and make a build that works for their own unique play-style. Overall, it is a good game and i would recommend it, however it definitely has its own issues and things that could be worked on.
My hatred for this game is unfathomable. Yet I continue to play.

I've been playing this game since late December of 2016, and back then it was my favourite game. I played it nonstop with my friends all the time. Back in 2018 my computer decided it would become incompatible with directX so I was unable to play a lot of my favourite games. I recently just got back into this game due to a friend discovering it for the first time. I'm dissapointed at how play-to-win this game has become over the time I've been gone. 
Now, I'm not saying it's play to win, it's not, you can do just as much as anyone with enough practice, but seriously, all of my characters I got for free, and my friends who started this month have not even half my roster to play with and have to pay for those extra characters? I just don't understand

The game is fun and not like any other horror game I have played. This game can be scary but it is more competitive once you get used to the mechanics and how to play. I also like that they bring in actual horror movie characters. Very tasteful. I wish they allowed you to transfer over your progress from your system to your PC like other games did because I had to buy this game twice and buy characters all over again.

玩这个要三思，你要有一点意识和手法不然前期没好的技能会一直坐牢，这玩意前期特吃血点，中后期还行了，新手建议先用兔妈和叮当，护士带着练，之后兔妈显得无力再用叮当，叮当无力的时候护士也差不多练起来了，护士有暗眼和一拖三基本可以打一些路人局，不断转点不让人开机就行，总的来说就是意识练出来了就行，这游戏意识大于手法就看你理解怎么样。这游戏总的来说挺好的，就是前期对新手不太好，游戏流畅度和画质应该可以说是我玩的游戏里面中顶尖的了。
